WorkItem.Description:
Currently named ranges are stored in the PHPExcel.php for all worksheets using the name of the defined range as the key in the array.  In Excel 2007, you can define the same defined named in many different sheets as shown below using scope.  This causes PHPExcel to only load 1 of the 5 below since it keeps re-setting the named range ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750.      
 
 
 
 
 
    <definedName name="ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750" localSheetId="3">a!$B$7:$B$56</definedName>
 
    <definedName name="ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750" localSheetId="0">'a test'!$B$7:$B$56</definedName>
 
    <definedName name="ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750" localSheetId="2">b!$B$7:$B$56</definedName>
 
    <definedName name="ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750" localSheetId="4">c!$B$8:$B$56</definedName>
 
<definedName name="ORB_V1_sh1_090527125941750">d!$B$7:$B$56</definedName>
 
J

Comments.Message: Can you attach a sample file?

Maarten,
I've already encountered this problem with the new calculation engine (my complex nested calculation test used named ranges across multiple sheets).
Do you want me to take ownership of this issue as part of the calculation engine? Or have you already done any work on it?
Mark, you can ho ahead and take ownership. I have looked into it but not yet fixed.
Mark, what is the status on this one?
